response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $8,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I believe this is an opportunity not to be missed. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing it at a special introductory price of $7,500. This offer is exclusive to you and is designed to make the product more accessible while ensuring you receive the best value for your investment. Should you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier product.", "product_price": 7500}
